snippet: As peace talks collapse and the carnage of the civil war continues, President Obama needs to persist on searching for a peaceful solution.
abstract: Editorial assesses the options for the United States and its allies in light of the apparent collapse of the United Nations-mediated peace talks on Syria; urges Pres Obama to persist in the frustrating search for a peaceful solution and, short of that, some means of lessening the misery of the Syrian people.
lead_paragraph: As peace talks collapse and the carnage of the civil war continues, President Obama needs to persist on searching for a peaceful solution.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
